name: Into the Sludge
description:
-Help Tomo find the source of the black Sludge and defeat the ultimate Sludge monster. Be careful, The Sludge has many friends keeping their eyes on you.

- Each level has a small boss that will drop a skull mask, and when picked up will give you special abilities.

- use [A] [D] to move the character right or left, and [W] to jump. 

- This cave system that Tomo must travel through is a maze. There is only one way to get out, so don't be afraid to explore every inch or corner, who knows, you may even have to walk through walls. 

Bonus: In the 3rd cave system there is a special mask hidden that could potentially save your life.
